name: lax-incense
effect: Held: Increases the holder’s Evasion by 5%.
short_effect: Held: Holder’s evasion is increased by 5%. Breeding: Wobbuffet begets a Wynaut Egg.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The beguiling aroma of this incense may cause attacks to miss its holder.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The beguiling aroma of this incense may cause attacks to miss its holder.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The beguiling aroma of this incense may cause attacks to miss its holder.
